user_query: I'm a huge fan of TikTok and I want to download a video by Cznburak. Can you provide me with the download link for the video? Also, suggest a recent anime that I can watch while enjoying the video.

TaskList.description: Search for the TikTok video by Cznburak and retrieve its details.
Generate a download link for the specified TikTok video.
Search for recent anime recommendations based on popular trends.
